title: Financial Modelling For Series A Fundraising
description: We’re seeking an experienced accountant to build a comprehensive financial model and profitability forecast in preparation for our upcoming startup fundraising round. The work will involve translating our operational and market data into clear, investor-ready projections. You’ll help us validate our growth assumptions and present a credible, data-driven path to profitability.

milestones.title: Data Gathering & Validation
milestones.description: Collect and verify all relevant historical, operational, and market data.

milestones.title: Financial Modelling
milestones.description: Develop a detailed, dynamic financial model with revenue, cost, and cash flow projections.

milestones.title: Profitability Forecast & Presentation
milestones.description: Create a profitability forecast and a concise investor-ready report or deck.
